pullRequest.title: Add LargeCraft Roles to RatGen
pullRequest.bodyText: Adds various large craft roles to MissionRole so that search checkboxes work

commit.message: Add civilian and warship class roles
Continue work on large craft roles

nodes.bodyText: TROOP_CARRIER is a combined forces transport, but it may just be vees and infantry. MECH_CARRIER should just be those with mech bays.
Similarly, this should probably be implemented as a filter that returns null for any unit that does not contain ASF_CARRIER.
